Tasks.Task Description: Set up a dedicated private connection between your on-premises network and Microsoft Cloud services using ExpressRoute. This connection can be established through an IP VPN network, a point-to-point Ethernet network, or a virtual cross-connection via a connectivity provider at a co-location facility.
Create and configure a virtual network gateway to connect your virtual network to the ExpressRoute circuit. This can be done using the Azure portal, Terraform scripts, or PowerShell commands.

Set up the connection between the virtual network gateway and your ExpressRoute circuit. Verify the configuration by checking ARP records and route tables under the ExpressRoute Private peering page in the Azure portal.

Enable ExpressRoute FastPath to improve the data path performance between your on-premises network and Azure. This involves setting up the FastPath on the gateway connection and ensuring accelerated networking is enabled on all VMs connecting to Azure Large Instances.

Use Network Insights and Network Watcher to monitor and customize metrics for your ExpressRoute connection. Set up alerts and connection monitors to ensure the reliability and performance of your network.
Evaluate and implement network security measures such as virtual networks, firewalls, and private endpoints to ensure secure connectivity between your on-premises network and Azure services.
Set up and manage peering configurations for your ExpressRoute circuit to establish connections to Microsoft cloud services like Azure, Microsoft 365, and Dynamics 365.

Review the network design to ensure connectivity between all resources, secure connections to Synapse Studio, and proper integration with private DNS zones. Verify that network and security outposts allow access to required on-premises sources.
Configure on-premises access via a Site-to-site VPN connection or ExpressRoute. Ensure that the ExpressRoute is in place before starting the project to avoid delays.
Assess regulatory requirements for data protection, access control, authentication, and network security. Ensure compliance with standards such as PCI, HIPAA, and other relevant regulations.
